website_summaries.verdict: One of the best robotic lawn mowers available on the market with one of the best prices, too.
pros: When properly set up, with wire at correcting spacing and distance, it cuts well
Program cuts one hour then auto charges for an hour
cons: Wire installation takes a long time
Stop button can be hit by low hanging branches or swings
Takes a few days to cut a large lawn

customer_reviews.title: As good as my Robomower but has limits
customer_reviews.text: Great little mower, but not very powerful. If you have any slope at all, gravity will overcome the motors power so it cant climb the slope, resulting in trimmed lower levels and uneven upper levels. Works perfectly on my flat backyard. Easy to use, does what it says, quiet as can be. The worst limitation is the cutting path- it is only 6" wide. So it takes this mower several days to reach every area, about 5000 sq '. Sometimes the yard looks half cut, but eventually it all evens out. Also have a small robomower that cost much more and this much less expensive mower matches up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery replacement after only 4 months of usage ???? WARNING TO EVERYONE !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: While initially I was excited about this product after 3+ months of usage, it was strange that the battery had died completely and I couldn't charge it (no matter what I tried). After talking to customer service they informed me that this can occur and it's not a deficiency in the product BUT the battery technology. So they shipped me another battery and the same thing happened NO CHARGE on the battery. So I've had to shelf this product until customer support can remedy this situation.
customer_reviews.author: C. Rod

customer_reviews.title: Did not  work
customer_reviews.text: After my initial sensor wire placement, I set the mower as instructed on the return wire and it followed it back to the docking station just as it was supposed to do, after that, it never worked again. "outside the boundary" was the error message. I even reduced my area and made it as simplistic as I could with no results. I clearly had a defective machine. The online help is dedicated to trying to convince you that your sensor wire installation is the problem beyond that good luck.
customer_reviews.author: Steven M.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product and Company
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product and company. Mower constantly stops in the middle of the lawn for no apparent reason. Mower constantly switches itself off on the charger so it won't go out until switched on. Customer service appalling, won't reply to emails - update site doesn't recognize serial number etc. A robo-mower is a great concept, but don't buy one from Worx!
customer_reviews.author: Mr Stub

customer_reviews.title: My best discovery to date!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this mower through a season and am starting my second. I had surgery on my foot which makes it more difficult to mow or even walk on uneven ground. This mower is AWESOME!! Five days a week it comes out and does it’s thing. I need to weed eat the edges every two weeks or so but that’s it I used to hire a kid that cost 15 plus bucks a pop so this has already paid for itself! I’m 70 years old and I installed myself so it’s fairly easy IF YOU FOLLOW DIRECTIONS.
customer_reviews.author: John Dwynn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Robotic Mower! Very Happy with My Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent robotic mower! Quick shipping, easy to set up, and now the yard is always perfectly mowed automatically without me having to do anything. I couldn't be happier with my purchase. The only thing that I would like to see Worx bring to the US market is the ability to connect to the mower from your phone, so you can change when it cuts, etc. directly from your smartphone. They have this in the European market, but for some reason not in the US. If it had this feature here in the US, I would upgrade to a model that has it in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Fleener

customer_reviews.title: How to maintain your independency
customer_reviews.text: The Worx Landroid Robotic Lawn mower is just great. We named it Little Dude and it runs the back yard. Being in my 80's I no longer can walk behind a mower so this has given me back my independency. I can live a home and take care of the yard with Little Dude and a great feeling of being independent. Thank you so much for this great invention.
customer_reviews.author: Jo-Carol Arisman

customer_reviews.title: but so far so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far this works as advertised. I have a small, fenced in back yard and the robot cuts it all in about an hour and a half, using about 60% of the battery charge. I am not very handy and had no problem installing the guide wire (you must use this, unlike a Roomba that will just sense the walls) and programming the unit. It stays outside all the time and runs at the designated time I set. I've only had it for a few weeks, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Mozwhite

customer_reviews.title: Lock and leave Homeowners’ best yard tool.
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty amazing and great for lock and leave home owners or AirBnB. Quiet, safe and really leaves a nice lawn. Lots of work to install It and It is difficult to gauge where to run the wire to cut as closely to the edge as needed. Good videos on YouTube on installation to help, however. Robot is not very all terrain and tends to get stuck in drainage areas. Very effective if your HOA mows your front lawn and you are left to do the back. Just need to weed whack occasionally. Very cool device for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Majorparadox

customer_reviews.title: Nothing lasts very long
customer_reviews.text: We have loved this thing for the 2 years it worked. Now the charging base is dead and the product is discontinued. This is extremely disappointing spending 1,000 on a mower should not mean the stuff dies and it is discontinued, then you need to buy another one just for something like the charging base. If we do it again, will choose another company.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Snyder-Hill

customer_reviews.title: Protip: mow lawn first
customer_reviews.text: Fun to watch this thing putz around the yard. Protip: cut your lawn before you install it. Makes pegging the stakes easier, leaves less slack in the wire, and the mower doesn't cut long grass well.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Pace

customer_reviews.title: Landroid, where have you been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: This mowbot kicks grass! I love this thing, everyone needs one. Easy to set up, easy to program, easy to watch while it works without you!!. 'Moween' Or 'Mowrece' is happy to work overnight while you sleep, its quiet enough to use at any hour
customer_reviews.author: E. Lektrishun

customer_reviews.title: Buttons quit working
customer_reviews.text: I really wish I could give this product 5 stars. I love the functionality. Unfortunately I am on my second landroid, as the first one simply stopped working. I believe the battery was defective. Now, the second one no longer works because a couple of the numeric buttons quit working. It will not turn on without resetting the numeric pass code. I am going to attempt a second return in hopes they still honor the warranty, but so far it's been hard since the Amazon return feature seems to be limited to my return last year. I'll keep digging....
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Great while it worked but support not so great
customer_reviews.text: We really like this but it’s been malfunctioning the last couple of months and now it’s completely stopped working. We’ve contacted the support line but been told it may be several weeks before someone can reach out to us. Worried the problem is going to get worse and not be fixable by the time the reach back out to us.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Schreiber

customer_reviews.title: Works great after some amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: I had originally bought this a while ago on flash deal, and had it for a while before I got to set it up. When I finally did, there was an issue with getting the time set correctly. After a chatting with the people at Landroid/Positec and trying some simple troubleshooting, they took the machine back to do some more advanced diagnostics, and ended up replacing the board for free. The entire process was painless, they made it very easy! It's been working great ever since ( about a month now
customer_reviews.author: mturck

customer_reviews.title: It’s all in the setup
customer_reviews.text: This mower does what it says. She very quiet and has an amazing ability to manover her way up hills backwards. If you set up the boundary wire as instructed, she works like a charm. If you don’t she will not work correctly. It took me a day and a half to set up my wire. But worth it. Just be prepared that every man in the neighborhood will all the sudden want to come over in envy, and want to talk about her.

customer_reviews.title: My lawn is mowed
customer_reviews.text: I could write a long review, but I only mowed my lawn once this year when I installed my boundary wire. I'll never mow it again. This thing does. Nothing else matters after that.
customer_reviews.author: DrewV1

customer_reviews.title: Nice Design.  Good for VERY SMALL FLAT YARD.  Don't buy if you have slopes.
customer_reviews.text: Good for tiny flat yard. Don't buy this if you have slopes. Waste of money. Keeps running out of boundaries. Can't keep it running consistently with any slope. Support folks are very nice and will try to help.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Fuller

customer_reviews.title: MY ABSOLUTE FAVORITE
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine. Does an excellect job and has only got stuck 1 time in 4 months. The only negative is the battery only lasting 1 hour after 4 months of use. The unit I received from amazon was already close to two years old according to the date code on the packaging. I would really appreciate and update my review to five stars if they would replace tha battery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can’t setup external base
customer_reviews.text: Can’t setup external base. Returned and bought the robo mower
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Ours works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: We love our mower. Took husband a while to get used the idea but now he wants one for the front yard too! Follow as directed to install and you will see it does work.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki V

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be placed in an area in shade where you have 6 feet in front and 6 feet in back of it. Electric cord is really long.
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this! I have it running in he middle of the night so I am not bothered by it during the day. My uncle made a little “car port” for it to keep it shaded since the place I wanted it was in full sun.
customer_reviews.author: hike4ever

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase
customer_reviews.text: We call him Landry and he’s part of the family . My favorite thing to do is have a drink in hand and watch him do his thing. I also think that 10 years from now his descendants will take over the world and we will have to find a John Connor of our own to fight his cousins.
customer_reviews.author: Charles H. Tran

customer_reviews.title: Solid robot
customer_reviews.text: Life saver during the 100+ days of the summer. Has held up great over the past 12 months.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Best Idea Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best idea ever! Not only does it cut the grass everyday on its own but the grass looks great! I only use it in the fenced in back yard because I'm afraid of theft. I cut the front yard with my push mower and let the landroid do its thing in the back and I have to say the landroid did a better job than I did. I built an eclousure to keep it out of the elements in a shed door I don't use anymore. Can't wait for a maintenance free summer!
customer_reviews.author: robert porta

customer_reviews.title: Flawless operation
customer_reviews.text: My Worx Landroid has been cutting my grass since before Memorial day. 2 years ago!!! Absolutely love it! Zero problems. Wonderful product. 10 stars kiddos. Get one. You won't regret it! My neighbors look at me and say "are you that old? Are you that lazy? Or are you that smart?" Makes me giggle like a little schoolgirl.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey McConnell

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Goes over the same atea repeatedly, moves extremely slow. Was a tremendous waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Don't come 4 me

customer_reviews.title: self operated mower
customer_reviews.text: The worx mower works great just as it was advertised to.
customer_reviews.author: terry joe tarbet

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have been using it for 5 weeks and it works perfectly .
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth J. O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: My husbands new best friend! Fascinates the neighbors
customer_reviews.text: My husbands new best friend! Fascinates the neighbors. Lol. Not enough wire, but that is our only complaint and was an easy fix.
customer_reviews.author: D Deaton

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Still getting things setup so I cannot give a true grade.
customer_reviews.author: webarth47

customer_reviews.title: More than likely the reason some of the bad reviews. After setting up every instruction to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this about 2 weeks ago. I've had my troubles with the UMV, but only because I didn't optimuly set it correctly. More than likely the reason some of the bad reviews. After setting up every instruction to the T, it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great. trying to find a little garage for it.
customer_reviews.author: scott knight

customer_reviews.title: Does an excellent job. Well worth the money for the time ...
customer_reviews.text: First year in service. Does an excellent job. Well worth the money for the time not spent mowing.
customer_reviews.author: Carl R. Hallam

customer_reviews.title: Can't go through my gate so can't get to smaller front yard
customer_reviews.text: Great so far. Hope they upgrade the firmware soon to enable the thing to go through gates.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: 1/4-Acre is the ABSOLUTE Max for this model. Time will tell (And so will I...) ..if it's durable over 5 years.
customer_reviews.text: Good enough for our front ditch, but way too small capacity for our yard. At first, it was unable to keep up with the extreme growth (alot of rain in our area.) by the second cutting with a regular mower, it is able to hold it's own now. If only you could add extra batteries to increase mow-time or lawn-size capability. Gets stuck ALOT. (At the lip/edge of it's recharge station,??..Really??)
customer_reviews.author: Pursuit

customer_reviews.title: Lawn Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: Product works as intended. Still have to trim the perimeter of the yard by hand but the Landroid keeps it in great shape. You do have to run a wire around the perimeter of your lawn and it leaves about 6 inches of grass uncut all around the perimeter. It does get stuck on occasion and sometimes runs out of juice before it gets back to the charging station when it is hot outside. Overall does a great job and works! Now if I could only find a cheap replacement blade. . .
customer_reviews.author: CyClone

customer_reviews.title: Weak signal
customer_reviews.text: Your Landroid is going in circles. It thinks it is out of bounds. Wait. Maybe it is not the Landroid going nuts. Maybe it is your boundary wire. Even when connected, there may be spots where the wire has sunk so deep in the sod that the signal is weak. Bypass sections of the boundary wire until the trouble is found. Then lay new wire over the weak section. Solder connections so they don't come loose and coat with liquid electrical tape so they are water tight. Your Landroid will love you!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Relf

customer_reviews.title: Works well and looks cool.
customer_reviews.text: It does a pretty good job of cutting the grass. Misses a few spots here the there, but no big deal. The only problem I am having is my dog likes to chew the guide wire. I don't use the home return function, because that requires a 14 margin that would be uncut and I would have to touch up later, so I put it back myself and leave a 4 inch margin instead.
customer_reviews.author: Anoosh Moadab

customer_reviews.title: update: Mowing the lawn is now fun!
customer_reviews.text: late May: It arrived yesterday, and we spent most of today setting it up. We had to buy another 60 feet of wire and about 20 more pegs from the hardware store; then we plugged it in and it started up and worked right away! early July: update over a month later: we have not had to make any more changes to the wire layout. In order to leave our badminton net up we put some cedar edging around the poles. This runs every day and does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: but I love it. Wish parts were more easily available
customer_reviews.text: Takes some tinkering, but I love it. Wish parts were more easily available, such that I could buy a base station for my front yard and have one for the back. As it is setup, my landroid cuts the back every day and it leaves the lawn in perfect shape ( versus me scalping the front every 2 weeks with my push mower. The firmware in my version is a little funky as far as setting the schedule, but I'm sure they have worked through that. This is my third season with it and it's still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked until it ran low to return to charge station
customer_reviews.text: I tried this robot mower with the hope that it would give me some time back. It worked great until it ran low on battery. My yard was just below the stated mowing capacity and I even adjusted the mow area to accommodate the droid. The problem I had was it would run out of battery before returning to the charging base. I had to recover it every day and put it back on the base. I think a small yard would be ideal for this robot mower.
customer_reviews.author: CFREEL

customer_reviews.title: I love this machine!
customer_reviews.text: No more weekend mowing... It works great on my ~700sqft lawn. I first used the spikes to lay the perimeter wire. I then dugg it down selectively (mostly high-traffic areas) to keep the wire from ripping. I had the Landroid get stuck 3 times in the beginning, but after addressing the ground and rerouting the wire it works flawlessly. The manual mentions firmware updates, but I can not find any on the support website. I would definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only given one star because that's my only option. ...
customer_reviews.text: Only given one star because that's my only option. It absolutely will not cut 1/4 acre if you have a tiny city lot could work for you after you lawnmower proof your yard it gets stuck in a lot of places and you have to go on scavenger hunt to find throughout your yard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Robot mower
customer_reviews.text: I like it..If don't have brake down I like it...
customer_reviews.author: tyger

customer_reviews.title: I love it, directions were easy to understand along with ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it, directions were easy to understand along with then helpful video👍🏽Excellent product I would recommend it to friends and family!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Mower
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome. The boundary takes a little time to set up but it it not hard.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Massey

customer_reviews.title: I liked this item and my husband liked it also but ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked this item and my husband liked it also but didn't like the Dock Station being placed outside. We thought that you could place it in the Garage.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon D. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It was a big hit as a gift.
customer_reviews.text: We haven't actually used it yet. I gave it to my husband for Christmas. Every person he tells about wants to know more.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: seems to work best when allowed to mow pretty regularly
customer_reviews.text: Works well, seems to work best when allowed to mow pretty regularly. However, it could use some sort of housing since the base must be connected to the wiring, so you need to build a little she'd that it can sit in and not get rained on (or stolen)
customer_reviews.author: MrPersonGuy

customer_reviews.title: Doing the lawn in the 21 century!
customer_reviews.text: Great little mower.....everyone one who sees it loves it, and wants one.
customer_reviews.author: LR Burks

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This unit shuts off on the charger and while mowing, No help from the company solving the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Smokey

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Works as hoped for. Questions answered by customer support. Let's see how the cute little thing lasts.
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: software sucks.
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this product and decided to return it. The mower would not go back to the charging base and it keep shutting down with a error message saying it is trap. I am so tire of trying to make this work. I love technology but this sucks. The design is nice but the software leaves alot to be desired.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: spend more money the thing is junk
customer_reviews.text: The thing has no brains tried it many times definitely would not buy
customer_reviews.author: Stephenr Anderson

customer_reviews.title: i watched it go around my yard for about an ...
customer_reviews.text: i watched it go around my yard for about an hour and could not see any grass that it cut I returned it for a full refund
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: horrible !!
customer_reviews.text: never mentioned about wiring the entire boundary line of your yard !! also how it will cross the basement garage doorway, because i have grass yard on either side of the driveway !!!
customer_reviews.author: asishghosh

product_meta.title: WORX WG794 Landroid Pre-Programmed Robotic Lawn Mower with Rain Sensor and Safety Shut-Off
product_meta.description: Style:Landroid onlyThe Worx Landroid is the pre-programmable robotic mower that lets you customize daily mowing schedules. The Landroid runs 7 days a week giving your lawn a continuous manicured look by giving the grass a trim on a routine basis as opposed to traditional mowers that take off substantial amounts of grass on a less frequent basis. Among its many features, Landroid navigates narrow passages, cuts with precision on slopes angling up to 20 degrees and does it all with zero emissions. If your lawn is under 10750 square feet and you want it to look great every day, the Landroid is designed precisely for you. The Intuitive keypad makes it easy to customize a mowing schedule so your lawn is neatly mowed every day. The low noise operation allows you to mow during the day or night. This allows you to wake up to a freshly mowed lawn every morning. The Landroid runs off of a 28V rechargeable battery so there are zero emissions.
feature_bullets: Fully programmed out of the box for easy set up and use
AIA technology allows Landroid to make intricate cuts and navigate narrow passages
Landroid evenly mows inclines and declines up to 20 degrees, No load speed: 2800/minute
Landroid uses shock sensor system to mow around obstacles
Automatically returns to base in case of rain or for recharging battery, Cutting Height:1.6; 4 inches, Cutting Height Positions:5, Max Cutting Surface:1/4 Acre

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars189 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
